author: Special Correspondent
text:
Pair of kidneys, eyes, liver and skin were harvested from a brain dead accident victim at the KMCH Speciality Hospital here on Thursday.

Soon after the patient Nandakumar (46) of Gobichettipalayam was diagnosed as brain dead by a team of doctors at KMCH Erode, following a brain surgery in another hospital necessitated by grievous head injuries caused by a motorcycle accident two days ago, his wife Latha came forward to donate the organs.

One of the two kidneys was transplanted to a patient at KMCH Erode itself, and the other was sent to KMCH Coimbatore. The liver was sent to Manipal Hospital, Salem, and the pair of eyes to Agarwal Hospital, Erode, while the skin was sent to Ganga Hospital, Coimbatore.
title: Organs of brain dead harvested
